title: I Have Been Taking the Wrong Approach About Ranked Dynamic Q.
body:
I have been going about this thing all wrong.  I have been saying that I would never play ranked again until Solo Q was back.  

But I now see my approach was just misguided and that I am now truly on the right path.  Now that ranked no longer matter in terms of sklll, I can and will play ranked EVERY match and with a IDGAF attitude.  

No more practicing champs in normals.  No more trying out troll builds against bots or blind pick.  From now on its Teemo support, Leblanc jungle and Taric top lane with no regrets.

I used to take ranked seriously.  You know, practice non stop in normals then really step it up for ranked matches.  But now that ranked is one big joke, I don't have to take it seriously any more.  WHAT A RELIEF.

replies.body:
If its so funny then let me say it in his stead.  

Well you are silver 3 so you obviously didn't take ranked that seriously in the first place.

In all seriousness if you are going to be an idiot in ranked then no amount of solo que or dynamic que can save your ass.  

Git Gud Scrub.

says the low plat
Who probably got there by being dyna-boosted.  This guys been going around insulting anyone who dislikes dynamic queue. Most likely so he can feel like he earned his rank
Well you're Silver 3, so you obviously didn't take ranked that seriously in the first place.

> [{quoted}](name=Sir Hammerlock,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=UekEOPNO,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-06-01T13:59:01.482+0000)
>
> Well you're Silver 3, so you obviously didn't take ranked that seriously in the first place.

That is funny coming from someone who isn't ranked at all.

Yup, I can't play ranked on this account anymore, but simple history on this account would show you that I've been Diamond and Platinum the last two seasons.

My current account; Tha Furry is playing at Diamond MMR and climbing from Plat 4 up.

Advice; the Queue system isn't the reason you're Silver 3, your ineptitude and attitude is.
put as much effort into dynamic queue that riot did when they made the choice to kill solo queue. i like it.
Im s2 and only play this game high af. And I dont even play carries. I think your just bad...you should prob quit and play mario kart tbh.

Really can't call me out on being "low plat" (btw plat 2 is high plat not low, not sure how you learned to count in elementry school but plat 5,4 is low, 3 is middle and 2, 1 is high) since you are barley ranked yourself (lol silver 3 is considered good now?)
